title: Do we have to do project work??
content: Like creating our group and building something for which we are awarded marks, like EL is there in RVCE, is there anything similar in PESU

comments.body:
We have semester wise Mini projects for semster courses.  
We also have a Capstone Project , which is a Big project component of your course starting from 5th sem.
Can you elaborate on mini project a bit please
Can you elaborate a bit about mini projects a bit please

They are course oriented projects. In general you make groups of 2 to 4(based on the course instructions) and work on a project related to the course during the semester.  
Different courses have different levels of project difficulties,scopes etc.
